ValidationRule.description: Ensures that if the FF FP record to which this is linked is meant to have a linked employment, this is linked first.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(ISBLANK( OW_latest_update__c )) && NOT(ISBLANK( OW_latest_update__r.OW_employment_match_id__c )) && ISBLANK( OW_latest_update__r.OW_pension_employment__c ) && ISBLANK( OW_employment__c ) && NOT(ISCHANGED( OW_stop_internal_change_processing__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This pension is linked to an employment record. Please ensure this is validated first. If this is the case, raise an issue.
